sentence.text: We confirmed that this nonsense DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator mutation segregated with deafness in this family.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator

sentence.text: In conclusion, we described a novel nonsense DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator mutation that was responsible for the hearing loss in a Brazilian family.

entity.text: DNA damage response, signal transduction by p53 class mediator
